title: Reproducible and Automated Reporting with Quarto
description:
Learn how to create dynamic, reproducible reports using Quarto to enhance transparency and automation in your research workflows. 

This 2 hour online workshop will teach you how to integrate R code, data, analysis, and interpretation in a single document, creating automated, updatable, and publication-ready .doc/.pdf/.html reports. 

The next workshop will take place from 10am-12pm on Monday 20th April 2025. 

Learn more here [insert URL]

title: AI in the Biosciences Training Conference
description: A full-day conference bringing together researchers, data scientists, and educators to explore the transformative role of AI in bioscience research and training.

title: Spotlight on DaSH Partner
description: Discover how our DaSH partner is advancing data-driven science and contributing to collaborative training initiatives.
